# defaultTokenizingCharacterSet

**Type Property**

Returns the default tokenizing character set.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var defaultTokenizingCharacterSet: CharacterSet { get }
```

## Discussion

The default tokenizing character set is “,”.

## Configuring the Tokenizing Character Set

- **tokenizingCharacterSet**: The recevier’s tokenizing character set to `characterSet`.
